claim: Martin Freeman refused to portray the role of Tim Canterbury.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Martin John Christopher Freeman  (  born 8 September 1971  )  is an English actor , who became known for portraying Tim Canterbury in the original UK version of sitcom mockumentary The Office , Dr. John Watson in the British crime drama Sherlock , Bilbo Baggins in Peter Jackson 's The Hobbit film trilogy , and Lester Nygaard in the dark comedy-crime drama TV series Fargo .
